name: OutLawRemake
description:
The remake of Atari Game: OutLaw!

When two western cowboys meet each other in the wilderness, who will shoot faster?

*The game is currently in development*

A two players game

Player1: 

WASD -Movement, 

Space - shoot

Player2:

 Arrow Keys - Movement,

 RightShift - shoot

*The game is currently in development*

Game Programmer: Ricky Lyu

Game Artists: Gary Feng, Barry Ma

Game Directors Feature Designers: Ricky Lyu,Gary Feng

Art Director Designer: Barry Ma
